list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Changed the properties of the screen so that only what is seen is what is needed to be seen.
Created the check goal function to detect if the Turtle has made it to the ocean. Along with this, created the win condition text and reset the key functionality.

task.summary: Basics with turtle for drawing a dot. Also made sure the window won't close until the close window button is selected.
Added a basic function for inflation.
Inflation now require the user to press the "Up" arrow key. The balloon will now pop when the set limit is reached and print text to represent the pop.

Added some color variations that allow the balloon to change color after each time it pops. Along those lines, made a tracker for the initial color change. Finally, added a little bit of screen customization by changing the window's title name and background color to a sky blue. Also changed when the window closes so that there aren't any accidental misclicks that close the program early.

Set up the screen properties.
Created the function to draw a single star.
Randomized the star size and started my for loop.
For loop makes 100 stars. Location of stars defined. Draw Speed increased.
Fixed the integer/float error caused by the randrange function.
Created the background color representing sand. Created the box and filled it with blue to represent the ocean.

Changed the shape of the turtle to a Turtle. Created the functions for movement of the Turtle. Mapped the keystrokes to the functions for movement.
Turtle

Changed the properties of the screen so that only what is seen is what is needed to be seen.
Created the check goal function to detect if the Turtle has made it to the ocean. Along with this, created the win condition text and reset the key functionality.

MESSAGE.value: Basics with turtle for drawing a dot. Also made sure the window won't close until the close window button is selected.
Added a basic function for inflation.
Inflation now require the user to press the "Up" arrow key. The balloon will now pop when the set limit is reached and print text to represent the pop.

Added some color variations that allow the balloon to change color after each time it pops. Along those lines, made a tracker for the initial color change. Finally, added a little bit of screen customization by changing the window's title name and background color to a sky blue. Also changed when the window closes so that there aren't any accidental misclicks that close the program early.

Created the background color representing sand. Created the box and filled it with blue to represent the ocean.

Changed the shape of the turtle to a Turtle. Created the functions for movement of the Turtle. Mapped the keystrokes to the functions for movement.

Changed the properties of the screen so that only what is seen is what is needed to be seen.
Created the check goal function to detect if the Turtle has made it to the ocean. Along with this, created the win condition text and reset the key functionality.
